column2: Hey there! I'm Emily, and you might have met my brother Emilio. It's good to meet you!$We're twins who help the farmers since coming here searching for work a few years ago.
I've decided... you're my enemy now... Get. Lost.
Do you want to make an enemy of me?
Well, this is interesting. I think.
Oh yeah! This is fun, thanks.
WOO! You're the best! I'm glad you moved here, you really are the best.
We're both farmers, huh? I guess that makes us rivals!$Just watch me! I'll show the whole village who the best farmer is!
column3: My brother tends to give Vintius are hard time, but our jobs are different! That doesn't make his job less important.
